Datas.Name: Skill Mastery
Datas.Description: You can earn badges of Skill Mastery by reaching the maximum level in as many skills as possible.

Datas.Name: Assistance
Datas.Description: You can earn Assistance badges throught helping, assisting others with problems they ask you to help solve.

Datas.Name: Versatility
Datas.Description: You can earn badges of Versatility by aquiring as many different skills as possible.
